episode of.title: Holk Master-class, ABC of Strategy, Marketing & Communications. Part VII: HR management and innovation. (TV Series 2018)

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Holk Master-class features animated academic models and interviews with acclaimed entrepreneurs, professors and business executives. Bring your class book to life. Watch the short film episodes before class as flip-the-class-room, in class as basis for discussion, or simply as inspiration. Part VII: HR management and innovation (Episodes approx. 15 min. in duration): Reflection on mission, vision and the golden circle, Career Planning, Reflection on HR management and Maslow's hierarchy of needs, Leadership and job motivation, Code of conduct and CSR, Business innovation.

plot: Holk Master-class features animated academic models and interviews with acclaimed entrepreneurs, professors and business executives.

Holk Master-class features animated academic models and interviews with acclaimed entrepreneurs, professors and business executives. Bring your class book to life. Watch the short film episodes before class as flip-the-class-room, in class as basis for discussion, or simply as inspiration. Part VII: HR management and innovation (Episodes approx. 15 min. in duration): Reflection on mission, vision and the golden circle, Career Planning, Reflection on HR management and Maslow's hierarchy of needs, Leadership and job motivation, Code of conduct and CSR, Business innovation.
